sentences.en: He felt it was a threat to his masculinity.
sentences.cn: 他觉得这对他的男子气概是一种威胁。

sentences.en: In Korean culture, men cry and otherwise easily show their emotions, something that might be considered a betrayal of masculinity in Western culture.
sentences.cn: 在韩国文化中，男人会哭，也会轻易地表现自己的情绪，但在西方文化中，这可能会被认为是对男性气质的背叛。

sentences.en: It seems that men with traditional views of masculinity are more likely to suppress outward emotions and to fear emotions, supposedly because such feelings may lead to a loss of composure.
sentences.cn: 具有传统男子气观念的男性似乎更有可能抑制外部情绪和恐惧情绪，大概是因为这种情绪可能会导致失去镇定。
